name: Windless Land
description:
Game info.

Windless Land is a single player isometric action-adventure game. The player controls a knight who makes their way through a deadly fortress. On the journey he faces dangerous foes in combat. The sources of inspiration were Dark Souls and Death’s Door.

Controls for keyboard.

W A S D - Move.

E - Interact.

Left click - Light Attack.

Right click - Heavy Attack.

Spacebar - Dodge Roll. 

ESC - Open/Close Menu.

Rebinding is available in the options menu.

Gamepads supported.

Install instructions. Windows.

Download the .zip-file and unzip it.

The game is named Windless Land inside the file map.
